message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I'm still a bit far from my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we meet at $12,000?
